p: Sesquiterpenes were the largest group of chemical constituents. The content of sesquiterpenes was 41 to 79% of the EO of wild hemp, 65 to 89% of the EO of the registered cultivars, and 70 to 89% of the EO of the breeding lines ( Supplementary Tables S1â€“S3). Sesquiterpenes constituted 54 to 55% of the EO in the USA hemp strain.
